Emperor Xiaowu was Emperor Jing's middle son. His mother was Empress Wang. Jing fourth year, as imperial son he was made King of Jiaodong. Jing seventh year, Crown Prince Liu Rong was deposed as King of Linjiang, the King of Jiaodong was made crown prince. Jing sixteenth year, the emperor died, the crown prince ascended the throne, becoming Emperor Xiaowu. Emperor Xiaowu at his initial ascension was especially reverent toward sacrifices to ghosts and spirits.
